title: Soldier Girls (1981) - Nick Broomfield Documentary
description:
1981 Documentary by Nick Broomfield, following a group of female recruits in the US army going through basic training.

imdb - http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0083105/

Really excellent documentary, so good I thought it fitting for my first upload. highly reccomended.

Well, enjoy.

(my first torrent, so if anythings up with this one any tips for improving future uploads would be appreciated...)
